Title: Red Rose White Rose
Writer: Eileen Chang (based on a story by), Edward Lam (screenplay), Heng Liu
Actors: Joan Chen, Veronica Yip, Winston Chao, Zhao Chang
Plot: Chronicles the love life of a man, Zhenbao. He has a steamy fling with the wife of a friend, the saucy and exciting Red Rose. Even though he feels happy with her, he knows he will not end up with her. To maintain his reputation, he marries an antiseptic, frigid but classy lady of a prim and proper background (White rose). Dissonance abound when he finds his bride irritating.
